i18n.key: URL used to submit messages. It will be automatically completed by all the parameters needed to complete the submission.
name of the request parameter containing the URL of the link to share.
name of the request parameter containing the title of the link to share.
model used to generate the link's title. Two variables are available : {PAGE_TITLE} and {PAGE_URL}.
name of the request parameter containing the description of the link to share.
model used to generate the link's description. Two variables are available : {PAGE_TITLE} and {PAGE_URL}.
